name: Doomsday Rush
description:
A game about a normal kid from Earth, who picked up a fallen sword that possessed a strange power. Aliens from the outer space came to look for it and retrieve, but they didn't came just to retrieve the sword, instead they also destroyed the Earth deep into the abyss. Watch how the kid slaughtered them and save humanity from despair.

Gameplay:

To get a score, you simply need to get gems and kill aliens and just dodge all the obstacles for more gems to pick up and aliens to slay! In order to kill them, timing is the key! And here are the controls:

Controls:

Navigating the main menu:

Arrow left or right to navigate between play game, credits and quit game

"Enter" to select

Character controls:

Arrow up - Jump

Arrow down - roll attack when you are in the same lane with the aliens

Arrow left - Left dodge or attack when you are close to the aliens to the left

Arrow right - Right dodge or attack when you are close to the aliens to the right

Additional controls:

"P" to pause the game

"R" to resume (while in pause menu)

"Enter" to play again (while in death menu)

"Q" to quit the game (while in pause menu or death menu)
